msbt.message: Hey, ! Guess what? I finally left behind! We're neighbors!Yep, was rad, but it just felt like it was time to move on, y'know, ?Anyway, I've got an ACTUAL ton of unpacking to do, so I'm gonna get back to that. See you around!

Well, , I did it. I took your advice and here I am!I'm a, uher! ian? ite Whatever.I gotta say, I'm loving it here! I mean, it's just day one, but I'm stoked I took the plunge!Thanks again for the shove. Let's catch up once I'm unpacked, alright, ?

What is up! I was hoping I'd see you, , 'cause as of now, I'm all about !You know this is all your fault, right? I started packing the minute you told me about this place.Um, speaking of, I still gotta unpack, . But once that's done, let's hang out, alright?

Hey, ! Long time no see! What's good in the neighborhood, ?Umwhat's with the blank stare? It's me, , from . Ring a bell? No?OK, I'll start again Hello there! I'm . I just moved here. Let's be friends That better?

Well, , I made it in one piece. Thanks for inviting me out here!Y'know, this place is cool, but I can't stop making comparisons to .Don't worry. I'll get over it. This place totally has a coolness vibe that can't touch.Anyway, it's great to see you! Let's hang out later, !

Safe and snug in my new pad all thanks to you, .Y'know, if you hadn't told me about this place, I doubt I ever woulda found it.It rocks how chill everyone is here. You just KNOW 's a good place. I love it!Well, hit me up when you wanna hang out, !

Been a while, ! Remember me?You told me to move here from , but I don't think I've seen you since I got here.I was kinda worried I'd moved to the wrong island, ! Yikes!Anyway, let me know if you wanna do, like, neighbor stuff. See you!

Yo, ! How you d-d-dAAAAACHOOO! Guh. Sorry about that.Anyway, thanks for the chat on . I made it, even if I got sick on the way over.Now that we're island buds, we gotta hang out, . Let's justwait till I'm feeling better first.

How's it going, ? Great to see you again!Let's see, what's new Oh! Well, I live here now! Yeah, you can blame for that.I was told this place is pretty rad, so I chased it up and here I am! Otherwise, umyeah, that's it.Anyway, we should hang out once I'm unpacked, !
Hey, ! OK, I know what you're thinking, "What's doing here?"Easy! visited and told me was a pretty sweet place. So I moved!Now we're island buddies! Once I'm unpacked, we totally gotta party, !
Whoa! ? You live here too? That kinda blows my mind! Total surprise, ! REALLY shoulda mentioned you when hyping up !Well, cool! We're neighbors now, neighbor! Here's to us!

! It's you! Stoked to see you! Did tell you I moved here? was talking all about this place a while back. It sounded kinda cool, so here I am!I'm gonna count on you to introduce me around, alright, ? But till then, take care!

Hey, ! You been avoiding me? Nah, just kidding. It's rad to see you!So was telling me was pretty cool, aaaaand I kinda impulse-moved.I'm pretty sure it was the right call, 'cause now we can hang out, like, whenever, !

We meet again, . COUGH, COUGH, COOOOUUUGH!Ugh. YeahI'm sick. It does make my voice sound kinda cool though.I'm guessing I caught some kind of bug. Or it's a parting gift from .Anyway, glad I got to say hi to you. Let's catch up when I'm feeling better, .

What's with the confused look, ? It's weirding me out. You surprised to see me?Some local sold me on moving here. I packed up as quick as I could, but they bolted before I got here. Rude!Well, I say they didn't know what they had, . 'Cause this place rocks!Let's hang out sometime, alright?

Hey, ! It's me, ! How's it going?Remember me? We met a while ago on .Someone from here convinced me to move, but I guess they left or something So uncool.Well, I've still got you around, and you're SUPER cool, so it balances out, .

Oh. Hey, . Good to see you, .You remember me, right? We talked for a bit at my old place, before I moved here.Anyway, sorry if I seem a little low-key. I'm a kinda sick, and it hurts to be, like, enthusiastic.Let's chat some more when I'm feeling better, alright?
You look surprised to see me, .Yeah, I kinda got homesick for , so I moved back. Just like that, !I missed how chill stuff is here, y'know? Oh! Speaking of chill, let me know if you want to sometime.
Ahh! I forgot how much I missed it here, .I mean yeah, was pretty cool, but is totally where it's at!I'm SOOOO glad I moved back! Let's hang out later, alright, ?

BwahhahhhAAAACHOOOO! Hi, .Sorry I haven't had a chance to say hey yet, butwell, you see why.I think gave me a little parting bug on the way out. Oh well, I'm back on .Once I get over this, we should hang out, . Till then, take care.

Oh, hey! It's , right? I didn't know you lived here.We met on a while back, remember? Well, I'm a resident of now!I'm glad I ran into you, but right now, I gotta get back to unpacking. See you around, !

What's up, ? I THOUGHT I heard you lived here. Very cool!I guess I shoulda tried to say hi earlier. Things have just been kinda hectic.So, any big news since we talked on ? Besides getting a rockin' new neighbor, that is.Actually, I should run, but I wanna hear all about you later, alright? Don't be a stranger, !

You're, right? We met on , I think, .I thought I saw you around, but I haven't had time to do the hello thing. Awesome seeing you again!And now that we're island buddies, you can clue me in on all the sweet parties!

Whoa! ! I never, ever thought I'd see YOU again.You seemed super cool when we met on . I kept wanting to look you up, but I never got to it.Anyway, I didn't know you lived on ! That's rad! Let's hang out sometime, new neighbor!

Oh, h-hey. How're you doing, ? COUGH, COUGH, HACK, COUGH!Ugh. I busted my butt getting stuff ready to move here, and now I'm paying for it, .Anyway, it's good to see you again. Come by when I'm feeling better, alright?

Hey, ! Guess what? I finally grit my teeth and moved here! We're neighbors!It just felt like it was time to move on, y'know? Although that island WAS pretty rad, Well, I've got an ACTUAL ton of unpacking to do, so I'm gonna get back to that. See you around!

Well, , I did it. I took your advice and here I am!I'm a, uher! ian? ite Whatever.I gotta say, I'm loving it here! I mean, it's just day one, but I'm stoked I took the plunge!Thanks again for the shove. Let's catch up once I'm unpacked, alright, ?

What is up! I was hoping I'd see you, , 'cause as of now, I'm all about !You know this is all your fault, right? I started packing the minute you told me about this place.Um, speaking of, I still gotta unpack, . But once that's done, let's hang out, alright?

Hey, ! Long time no see! What's good in the neighborhood, ?Hey, what's with that blank stare? It's me, , from uhthat island! Ring a bell? No?I'll start again Hello there! I'm . I just moved here. Let's be friends Better?

Well, , I made it in one piece. Thanks for inviting me out here!Y'know, this place is cool, but I can't stop thinking about that island where we met.Don't worry. It's nothing. That place can't touch the coolness vibe here.Anyway, it's great to see you, ! Let's hang out later, alright?

Safe and snug in my new pad all thanks to you, .Y'know, if you hadn't told me about this place, I doubt I ever woulda found it.It rocks how chill everyone is here. You just KNOW 's a good place. I love it!Well, hit me up when you wanna hang out, !

Been a while, ! Remember me?We met on that island. You told me to move here, but I don't think I've seen you since I got here.I was kinda worried I'd moved to the wrong place, ! Yikes!Anyway, let me know if you wanna do, like, neighbor stuff. See you!

Yo, ! How you d-d-dAAAAACHOOO! Guh. Sorry about that, .Anyway, thanks for the chat on that island, . I made it, even if I got sick on the way over.Now that we're neighbors, we gotta hang out. Let's justwait till I'm better first.

Hey, ! Guess what? I finally grit my teeth and moved here! We're neighbors!It just felt like it was time to move on. Also, talking with you at the campsite was pretty rad!Well, I've got an ACTUAL ton of unpacking to do, so I'm gonna get back to that. See you around!

Well, , I did it. I took your advice and here I am!I'm a, uher! ian? ite Whatever.I gotta say, I'm loving it here! I mean, it's just day one, but I'm stoked I took the plunge!Thanks again for the shove. Let's catch up once I'm unpacked, alright, ?

What is up! I was hoping I'd see you, , 'cause as of now, I'm all about !You know this is all your fault, right? I started packing the minute you told me about this place.Um, speaking of, I still gotta unpack, . But once that's done, let's hang out, alright?

Hey, ! Long time no see! What's good in the neighborhood, ?Hey, what's with the blank stare? It's me, , from the campsite! Ring a bell? No?OK, I'll start again Hello there! I'm . I just moved here. Let's be friends Better?

Well, , I made it in one piece. Thanks for inviting me to live out here!I gotta say, this place is super cool. The campsite was barely a preview of the real deal, !Well, it's great to see you! Let's hang out later, alright?

Safe and snug in my new pad all thanks to you, .Y'know, if you hadn't told me about this place, I doubt I ever woulda found it.It rocks how chill everyone is here. You just KNOW 's a good place. I love it!Well, hit me up when you wanna hang out, !

Been a while, ! Remember me?We met at the campsite. You told me to move here, but I don't think I've seen you since I got here.I was kinda worried I'd moved to the wrong island, ! Yikes!Anyway, let me know if you wanna do, like, neighbor stuff. See you!

Yo, ! How you d-d-d— AAAAACHOOO! Guh. Sorry about that, .Anyway, thanks for chatting with me at the campsite. I made it, even if I got sick on the way over.Now that we're neighbors, we gotta hang out. Let's justwait till I'm feeling better first.

How's it going, ? Great to see you again!Let's see, what's new Oh! Well, I live here now! You can blame for that.I ran into 'em at the campsite and was told this place is pretty sweet, so here I am!Otherwise, umyeah, that's it. Anyway, ! We should hang out once I'm unpacked!

Hey, ! OK, I know what you're thinking. "What's doing here?"Easy! and I ran into each other at the campsite.I found out from 'em that is a pretty sweet place. So here I am!Now we're island buddies! Once I'm unpacked, we totally gotta party, !

Bwa ha ha! ! It's awesome to see you, .Hey, wanna have your mind blown? We're neighbors now! That's right, I moved to .Yeah, I ran into at the campsite and all we could talk about was this place.Anyway, let me know if you wanna hang out. I'm always up for mischief.

! It's you! Stoked to see you! Did tell you I moved here?I met 'em at the campsite a while ago. I got an earful about this place, it sounded cool, so here I am!I'm gonna count on you to introduce me around, alright, ? But till then, take care!

Hey, ! You been avoiding me? Nah, just kidding. It's rad to see you!OK! There I was at the campsite when I ran into .Every talk we had kept comin' back to how rad is, soooo I kinda impulse-moved.I'm pretty sure it was the right call, 'cause now we can hang out, like, whenever, !

We meet again, . COUGH, COUGH, COOUUGH!Ugh. YeahI'm sick. It does make my voice sound kinda cool, though.I'm guessin' I caught some kind of bug at the campsiteOh, the campsite. was talkin' up over there, so I kindamoved.Yep. I'm your neighbor now. And other than catching this stupid cold, 's pretty sweet. Anyway, glad I got to say hey to you. Let's catch up when I'm feeling better, .

What's with the confused look, ? It's weirding me out. You surprised to see me?So I was out at the campsite when some local sold me on moving here.I packed up as quick as I could, but they bolted before I got here. Rude!Well, I say they didn't know what they had, , 'cause this place rocks!

Hey, ! It's me, ! How you been?So get this. I was staying at the campsite here when I got into a long talk with a local.They had tons of great stuff to say about this place, so I moved. But now they're not here! So uncool.Well, I've still got you around, and you're SUPER cool, so it balances out, .

Oh. Hey, . Good to see you again, .So get this. I was staying over at the campsite when your neighbor and I got to talkin', and nowI live here.Anyway, sorry if I seem a little low-key. I'm kinda sick, and it hurts to be, like, enthusiastic.Let's chat some more when I'm feeling better, alright?

Good to see you, ! Hey, thanks for the invite back at the campsite, .And if the boxes didn't give it away, I took you up on it. Whew I didn't know I had this much stuff Well, once I get everything cleaned up, we should hang out. Thanks for coming byneighbor!

Oh! Hey, ! How's things, ?I gotta say, you inviting me to move here back at the campsite was totally the highlight of that trip. Thanks!Anyway, as you can see, I've still got about a million boxes to unpack, so, um Let's hang out later!

My entire universe is boxes right now, This box even looks kinda like .Guess I'm finally losing it. Like, I remember the campsite and an invite, butfrom there it's just boxes. Oh well. It's good to vent, even if it's to a figment of my imagination. Take care, cardboard-.

It's the rock star! Thanks for the invite back at the campsite, .As you can see, I made it in one piecemore or less. I got a few bad paper cuts unpacking boxes.Anyway, I am so stoked to live on ! Let's hang out sometime, alright?

Well, if it ain't ! How are you, ?Oh! Hey, I still gotta thank you for the campsite invite, so Thanks!And sorry we couldn't hang out on my first day here, but I was kinda buried in cardboard and tragedy.I'm pretty sure I unpacked more dish shrapnel than actual dishes Oh well. You know how it goes.Anyway! We gotta hang out soon! Just let me know when, and I'm in.

! There you are! Great to see you.Hey, thanks for inviting me here back at the campsite. I was stuck in rut, and that was a perfect out.So far, this place rocks. Everyone's super friendly, it's gorgeousthe works! Thanks again. Really.Anyway, I know you're probably busy, but we should hang out when you've got some time, .

It's ! Bwa ha ha! I was wonderin' when you'd show up, .Hey, I gotta thank you. If you didn't invite me at the campsite, I wouldn't be here. This place rocks!Anyway, I hope I keep seein' you around. We still gotta have us some housewarming hang-out time!

Hey, look. It's . How's things?Me? I've just been laying low, you know how it— BWAAACHOOO! Ugh OK, so it's more like BEING laid low.I wanted to thank you for inviting me back at the campsite, but I've been holed up sick since I got here.Let's hang out when I'm feeling better. Sound good, ?

! You live here too, ?! Bwa ha ha!It's great to see you again! I was out at the campsite when I got invited to move here by .Anyway, I'm still trying to figure out where to put everything. But once that's solved, let's hang out!

Hey, ! Wanna take a guess who just moved here? Yup! Me, .It sorta just happened. I was at the campsite when I got invited to move here by .Well, as soon as I solve this box disaster, we totally gotta plan a party or something!

! Wow! Don't take this the wrong way, but I kinda forgot you lived here.I ran into at the campsite a while back and sorta talked their ear off.Eventually, I got asked if I wanted to move here and keep the conversation going. That was cool of 'em.Anyway, it's awesome that you're here too! Let me know when you wanna hang out, .
outta nowhere! How's it going?So I was chillin' at the campsite, and guess who strolls up to invite me to live here? !Pretty cool, huh? Anyway, now that we're neighbors, we totally gotta hang out, .

That you, ? I was wonderin' if you were still around, !Feels like forever ago when I was at the campsite and got invited to move here by Speaking of, I think the last time I saw YOU was when I was at that campsite. Wow! Time flies, huh?Well, now that I've got you here, don't be such a stranger, alright?

Huh? Oh, . How's it goin'? You haven't seen , have you?I'm asking 'cause I got invited to move here by 'em when I was over at the campsite, .I've been so sick since I got here th— BWAAAACHOOO! Ughthat I haven't had a chance to thank 'em yet.Anyway, I feel awful. But we should definitely hang out once I'm over this. Sound good?

Yo, ! How you doing, ?Soyou're probably wondering about all the boxes. Well, guess what? We're neighbors!Yeah, I was at the campsite and got an invite to move out here. I wasn't about to turn that down!Except now theflat tire that invited me doesn't live here anymore! I'm so angry at 'em, I won't say their name.But you and me? We're cool. And so is , for that matter. So I'll stick around.

What's up, neighbor? Bwa ha ha! You should see your face right now. How's it going, ?Alright, so I was out at the campsite when someone invited me to move out here. I'm like, "Cool, I'm in."Then I finally get here and that someone's long gone. Can you believe it?Anyway, I'm here now, it's awesome, and I'm stayin'. So let's hang out sometime, !

Oh, . Haven't seen you since the c— BWAAACHOO! Ughthe campsite.Ever go on a vacation so good that you wonder if the other shoe's gonna drop? The campsite was like thatEveryone was friendly, I had a lot of fun, and someone even invited me to come live here, .But now I'm sick, and whoever invited me is long gone. Yeah, that other shoe sure drop— BWAACHOO!Anyway, that's enough pity-partying for now. When I'm better, how about we do some party-partying?
